words.definition: A place where children go to learn.

example.en: I go to school every weekday.
example.ar: أذهب إلى المدرسة كل يوم في الأسبوع.

words.definition: A place where students study after high school.
words.arabic_definition: مكان يدرس فيه الطلاب بعد الثانوية.

words.definition: A person in the same class as you.

example.en: The professor explained the topic clearly.

words.definition: The land and buildings of a university.

example.en: The campus is large and beautiful.

words.definition: A plan showing when classes happen.

example.en: My class schedule is full this week.

words.definition: Homework or projects given by teachers.
words.arabic_definition: الواجبات أو المشاريع التي يعطيها المعلمون.

words.definition: A group of students who meet for activities.

example.en: I joined the music club at university.
example.ar: انضممت إلى نادي الموسيقى في الجامعة.

words.definition: The ceremony when students finish their studies.
